Hi, I'm Bruno!

I'm a Web Developer in training with customer experience background from New York. I am currently focusing on improving my skills with Web Technologies in pursuit of becoming a Full-Stack developer in the future. In my current role, I provide technical support by exibiting excellent customer service in regards to their technical issues. Check out some of my projects down below! I'm currently pursuing Technical Support roles where I can apply my Web Development skills to further grow and develop into a more versatile, valuable resource for the team.
